title: Player Data & Analytics With Cris Collinsworth
itunes:title: Player Data & Analytics With Cris Collinsworth
description:
The NFL regular season is on the horizon. Cris Collinsworth, former Pro Bowl wide receiver, lead analyst for Sunday Night Football on NBC, and majority owner of data analysis company Pro Football Focus, joins Jason, Barr, and Lynch to discuss the outlook for the upcoming season, the economic evolution of the sport, and NIL rules. Plus, they break down how his company PFF is powering the business of football.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
